channel.title: Third Cinema 4D render
channel.description:
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/312k0ug.png[/img]
MOAR - http://i32.tinypic.com/ve0ism.png
Trying out Cinema 4D my third time. This is the signature-type of C4D. Please note I'm not "pr0" and saying it's shit will not help me out to succeed.

item.title: Third Cinema 4D render
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:21, topic:290396”][quote author=Pookey71 link=topic=383903.msg2884131#msg2884131 date=1248493586]
Did you decide to take a dump? Because that would have been better than this.
[/quote]
I love you too.

Full Metalst:

Trying out Cinema 4D my third time. This is the signature-type of C4D. Please note I’m not “pr0” and saying it’s shit will not help me out to succeed.

I followed the tut Bowser.

http://i32.tinypic.com/ve0ism.png

Looking good, just looks fucked up on the top, not sure how to fix that. Probably another copy and paste/rotating should help.[/quote]
You get better, try less colours and use a little more self-critic (Hope it is right written) and do better work in Photoshop, try one time to copy the result of the tut and then try to make it better by seeing that you thinks it wrong with it.

And avoid chaos/mess without direction with colours and the shape.

Read full topic

item.title: Third Cinema 4D render
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:17, topic:290396”]Sorry, but it seems like you are not trying, you said it self, this is an outcome of luck, not skills.
I suggest you follow some of the tuts Frell linked too and you can make something good.

This 2 looks good:
http://bdk14.deviantart.com/art/Ultimate-c4d-abstract-tutorial-33414469
http://bdk14.deviantart.com/art/abstract-postwork-tutorial-33420452
Also tells you how to make a C4D to art.

Anyway you are free to call my work junk here if you want: bowser-jr.deviantart.com.[/quote]
I’m not calling your work junk, we all have our own styles. I’m just not that type of guy. Tbh, I was really confused, Cinema 4D is really hard when you’re not very skilled and only been doing it for a couple days :. What I really want to do is make the effect C4Ds, and also things like gif animations. Thanks for the links.

Read full topic

Anyway you are free to call my work junk here if you want: bowser-jr.deviantart.com.
